content.text:
The script timed out after 2 seconds. Based on what we can see:

1. The script started and printed "Start sleeping"
2. It appears to enter a sleep state and continues running (PID 184)
3. The execution was interrupted by a timeout after 2 seconds, so the script didn't complete

The script seems to be designed to sleep for some duration. To see the full content and understand what it's doing, let me check the script itself:
